properties.description: A dictionary object of metadata about per-feature properties.

schema.description: An object defining the structure of metadata classes and enums. When this is defined, then `schemaUri` shall be undefined.

schemaUri.description: The URI (or IRI) of the external schema file. When this is defined, then `schema` shall be undefined.

statistics.description: An object containing statistics about metadata entities.

groups.description: An array of groups that tile content may belong to. Each element of this array is a metadata entity that describes the group. The tile content `group` property is an index into this array.

metadata.description: A metadata entity that is associated with this tileset.

geometricError.description: The error, in meters, introduced if this tileset is not rendered. At runtime, the geometric error is used to compute screen space error (SSE), i.e., the error measured in pixels.

extensionsUsed.description: Names of 3D Tiles extensions used somewhere in this tileset.

extensionsRequired.description: Names of 3D Tiles extensions required to properly load this tileset. Each element of this array shall also be contained in `extensionsUsed`.
